title: The God Slayer's Handbook
description: Imagine having the power to build the life you have always wanted.In The God Slayerâ€™s Handbook, author Stany Austinson invites you to explore your full potential, break through the barriers that hold you back from your dream, rid yourself of self-sabotaging behaviours and harness limitless energies to bring your visions to reality.This guide will help you make the connections between what you have been taught and the actions or inaction that have plagued you and kept you from living intentionally.Inside the pages of this book, you will discover:What has impeded your journey forwardHow to break through and stop limiting beliefsHow to experience total liberation from societal demandsWho you were truly meant to be and a path to finding yourself and rising to the challenges aheadA path to enlightenmentAnd so much more!If you have ever craved freedom or ever wondered if there was something else in the universe for you, this book is for you.If you feel like you cannot move forward or fear what lies ahead, this book is for you.If you are not afraid to challenge your beliefs and embrace a new way of thinking, this book is for you.
author: Stany Austinson
